Multimedia.Music Player: Yes, Supports MP3, SMF, ADTS, iMelody, XMF, OTA, AMR, RTTTL, OGG, FLAC, RTX, WAV
Multimedia.Sound Enhancement: Movies Application, Sony Entertainment Network, WALKMAN Application, 3D Surround Sound (VPT), Clear Audio+, Clear Bass, Clear Phase and Clear Stereo, TrackID Music Recognition, xLoud Experience - Audio Filter Technology from Sony, Dynamic Normaliser, Play
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports 3GPP, AVI, WEBM, MP4, XviD, M4V, MKV

Camera.Other Camera Features: Smooth Zoom - 4x, Auto Focus, Geo-tagging, Image Stabiliser, Touch Focus, Auto Scene Recognition, Smile Shutter, Send to Web, Sweep Panorama, Touch Capture, HDR for Pictures, Quick Launch, White Balance, Self-timer, Face Detection

Internet & Connectivity.3G: Yes, 21 Mbps HSDPA; 5.76 Mbps HSUPA; HSPA+
Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (HFP 1.6, A2DP 1.2, GAPC / LE, AVRCP 1.3, HSP 1.2, PANP 1.0, OPP 1.1, PBAP, FTP v1.1)
Internet & Connectivity.Navigation Technology: A-GPS, GLONASS, with Google Maps with Street View and Latitude

Other Features.Important Apps: YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, Google, Xperia Link, Friends Application, Multiple Instant Messaging, Google Play, Google Voice Search, Google Talk, Sony Select, Web Browser (WebKit), Xperia Transfer, Xperia Care, Bookmarks, Hangouts, Gmail, Google Sync
Other Features.Sensors: Proximity Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, eCompass, Accelerometer, Magnetometer

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: Gesture Input, Senser-on-lens, Screenshot Capturing, Face Detection, Touch Gesture - 10 Fingers Multi-touch, Scratch-resistant - Touch Panel Cover Glass PMMA, Auto Rotation, Illumination Effect, Pan and Zoom, Shake Control
